bandar seri begawan airport

Highlights

On this full day tour, you will experience the best that Brunei has to offer. Brunei's golden domes await you on this journey of exploring the Borneo's abode of peace. This tour encompasses the best monuments and iconic sites that is part of Seri Begawan City, including awe-inspiring museums and an immersive experience at the water village. In the midst of the excitement, you will eat lunch the locals at a Bruneian restaurant.
